name: Hecahands Xeno
text:
3 "Hecahands" monsters
If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Hecahands Xeno" once per turn. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can look at 2 random face-down cards in your opponent's Extra Deck, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 of them to your field. If this Fusion Summoned card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can take control of any number of monsters they control.
